entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [CI] Test failure from `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Cookies_Http3.GetAsync_DefaultCoookieContainer_NoCookieSent` #101567
  • [API Proposal]: Streaming HTTP POST API for the System.Net.Http.Json extensions #101564
  • [Question/Bug] Endless stream of GC events occupying a CPU core: What could be happening ? #101563
  • Cannot inject HTTPClient into an IHostedService using HTTPClientFactory #101561
  • [API Proposal]: Overriding the default behavior in case of unhandled exceptions and fatal errors. #101560
  • Timeout in System.Net.Quic #101559
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Cookies_Http3.GetAsync_SetCookieContainerAndCookieHeader_BothCookiesSent #101553
  • High Memory Consumption When Validating Remote Certificates With Client SslStreams #101552
  • Normalize links in Markdown files #101550
  • [tvos-arm64] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.XsdDataContractExporterTests.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest failed #101549
    9.0.0
  • OS/arch optional arguments in Bundler and TargetInfo #101548
  • get_hostfxr_path memory leak in .NET 8 #101546
  • Unnecessary zeroing of boxed default instances #101544
    Future
  • Subtype relationship between collection and read-only collection interfaces impacts behavior of analyzers #101542
    9.0.0
  • Update tools to the latest version of System.Reflection.Metadata #101541
    9.0.0
  • Unable to cancel NamedPipeClientStream reads on MacOS #101539
  • `RuntimeInformation` causes unexpected allocations #101536
  • [API Proposal]: [HTTP/3] Support multiple HTTP/3 connections #101535
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] Support managing available streams on `QuicConnection` #101534
    9.0.0
  • [WASI][AOT] LLVM ERROR: out of memory #101533
    9.0.0
  • [WASI] re-enable pre installed WASI SDK & wasmtime #101528
    9.0.0
  • Dead lettering in wasm smoke AOT tests #101524
  • Blazor client side web debugging fails to function when run within IIS #101554

Closed

  • clang crashing on osx #99150
  • Allow default ALC to be unloadable for plugin scenarios #1633
    Future
  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.ChangeLocalTimeZone failing under wasm MT #101570
  • Long Running Test: System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101522
    9.0.0
  • Running a .NET assembly using reflection. #101558
  • Fatal error instead of calling Unhandled Exception Filter #95330
  • Allow ignoring unhandled exceptions in UnhandledException event handler #42275
    9.0.0
  • /usr/share/dotnet/sdk/8.0.202/Sdks/Microsoft.NET.Sdk/targets/Microsoft.NET.Sdk.FrameworkReferenceResolution.targets(491,5): error NETSDK1082: There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #100026
  • AssemblyLoadContext: requiring full cooperation to stay "inside" is fundamentally flawed #45285
    Future
  • [browser][WBT] SignalRClientTests.SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser - Connection closed #101497
    9.0.0
  • [ios-arm64] Keychain 'signing-certs.keychain-db' was not found #101551
    9.0.0
  • [Question] How to set proxy just for AAD endpoint? #100268
  • DelimitedListTraceListener delimiter cannot be set via attributes #30211
    Future
  • [browser][hybrid][firefox] RangeError: invalid value "Cyrl" for option region #100955
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ConnectionAttemptCanceled_AuthorityNotBlocked #100971
    9.0.0
  • QuicConnection.OpenOutboundStreamAsync can hang indefinitely #101233
    9.0.0
  • Disabling Blazor SIMD support breaks published app during runtime when AOT=false during publish #100234
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_AltSvc_Test_Http3 timeouts #101505
    9.0.0
  • Client certs with HttpClient on Windows prevents X509Certificate2 cleanup #101090
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Wasm linux/windows HighResource LibrariestTests AOT are failing on build #101104
    9.0.0
  • profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd failing on windows arm64 #98817
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WritingTooDeep failure #101470
    9.0.0
  • Consider adding a LinkHeaderValue/Parser #18004
  • Proposal: Cookie and SetCookie Properties in HttpHeaders #20049
  • Cache and reuse auth credentials #24660
  • HttpClient: Inconsistent header behavior with IDNA host names #24679
  • SocketsHttpHandler: should validate request after chained handlers execute #25112
  • Investigate perf improvements to Uri for SocketsHttpHandler usage #25709
  • CborReader should support reading from streams #101516

PullRequests

Created

  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Testing] Backport #91643 release/8.0-staging #101579
    needs-area-label
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement divide/multiply/subtract Math APIs #101578
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable derived COM interfaces to hide base methods with the new keyword #101577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • With system brotli, do not use versioned symbols #101576
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Allow JIT to know if dynamic pgo is active #101575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only warn on duplicate members within a single descriptors file #101574
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Allow preinitializing `EventSource` #101573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable interp pgo recording by default since it adds startup overhead #101566
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Collect all `MethodDesc` fields in one place #101565
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Suppress -Wformat-truncation for older GCC #101557
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Use IsOSPlatform instead of checking for /proc #101547
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Simplify some non-generic CompareTo methods #101545
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [wasm] Disable parallel upload to helix #101540
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add optimization flags to bitcode compilation #101538
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Include NativeLibrary items to the NativeFileReference items #101532
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP][mono] Force Mono to respect explicit struct size when LayoutKind.Sequential is used #101529
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable disabled test on s390x in ParallelForEachAsyncTests.cs #101527
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Merged

  • Share return value handling in trim analysis #101398
    needs-area-label
  • Disable parallel test execution for QUIC and HTTP/3 #101569
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Move timing out tests to Outerloop #101556
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Updated coding-style.md to point to the new dotnet format repo #101572
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add TensorPrimitives.Max/MinNumber #101435
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ICollection<T> usage to IReadOnlyCollection<T> where applicable #101469
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix MsQuicConfiguration.GetConfigurationCacheEnabled #101555
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • When initializing Lock in NativeAOT, get the processor count directly instead of using Environment #101514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Merge #91646 and #91708 into release/8.0-staging #101313
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Check if type is compatible right before emitting box #101509
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add test for boxing byreflike fail. #101458
    test-enhancement, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Store last OSR transition context in static memory in DEBUG builds #101537
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid some defensive copies on readonly structs in System.Net.Quic #101133
    area-System.Net
  • [browser][WBT] SignalRClientTests.SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser - Connection closed #101530
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/9.0-preview4] Restrict indentation size in JsonWriterOptions theories. #101525
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101306
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 6.0.31
  • SuperPMI: Reset method context 'fileHandle' to the beginning #101523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] modify the offset's formate of the float's load/store as decimal. #101526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [WASI] update SDK 22 and wasmtime 19.0.2 #101392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add runtime test for static gsharedvt methods #101489
    test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix `LLVMArgWasmVtypeAsScalar` when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix big endian issue in Interlocked test cases #101429
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Restrict indentation size in JsonWriterOptions theories. #101498
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*ZeroExtendTo*() #101291
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement Activity.AddLink #101381
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info and fix some arm32 bugs #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle case where falseValue is contained #101515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "disable optimizations for PopCount (#99796)" #101245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix Lock spin-waiting on single-proc machines #101513
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • enable dependabot for github actions #101406
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #101518
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 8.0.6
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host
  • [cdac] Read/store globals from contract descriptor #101450
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][MT] stop doing grow(0) #101248
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable jiterp #101252
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [S390x] Fix stack offset size while passing structure as argument. #101103
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static virtual calls #101491
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • Read EnableWriteXorExecute from runtimeConfig #101490
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add some R2R missing codes. #101480
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize bundled_resources key creation, hashing, and comparison #101460
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement alternative for reachable block detection #2478
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] remove pragma disabled warnings #2554
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Compile fails due to invalid cast error #2555
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Re-enable the `DotNetJsApi` smoke test #2558

Updated

  • NativeAOT LLVM: cannot follow instructions on Linux #1009
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new official build for runtimelab #2563

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Resolve some warnings, replace some `std` types with Jit types #2562
  • delete unused LegacyObjectWriter #2564
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Re-enable DotnetJs smoke test #2561
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable task interop #2551
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet build` fails with error NU1008 when directory tree contains multiple Directory.Packages.props files. #40445
  • Workload packages that are unlisted can't be installed #40440
    8.0.4xx
  • [dotnet format] 'Using directive is unnecessary' false positive in combination with Roslyn source generator #40427
  • Unable to run sdk solution in Visual Studio. Wrong compiler version referenced. #40423

Closed

  • dotnet new with preview builds should succeed #9205
    Backlog
  • Allow including an exe shim for global tools #9058
    Backlog
  • Cannot rollforward application to a later .NET Core version at publish #9117
    Backlog
  • Shallow Restore #8880
    Backlog
  • [Arch Linux] The requested URL returned error: 404 #1850
    Backlog
  • `wasm-tools` workload breaks `dotnet publish` in docker #32327

PullRequests

Created

  • [Main] Make pipeline ymls work with the SDK repo #40451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Sync dotnet/installer repo src/test changes #40452
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • GitHub workflow for actions/stale to label and close stale issues #40421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copy Installer Pipeline ymls #40420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2438523 #40397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set
  • Higher Kinded Polymorphism / Generics on Generics #339
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected behavior when Source Generator access external dll #73235
  • Source generator doesn't see DefaultMemberAttribute #73229

Closed

  • MetadataImportOptions.All doesn't work in source generators? #72369
  • Pull Diagnostics: Remove direct dependency on EnC, TaskList, Copilot diagnostic sources #72896
    Backlog
  • Type recognition error in Visual Studio #73228
  • CS3006 false-positive on operators with `in` keyword #73212

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix issue with temp storage system on unix systems #73238
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix stack overflow when parsing files linked into an enormous number of projects. #73237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Handle labels in outer scope in control flow pass #73234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement analyzer/fixer: remove unnecessary `Call` keyword from `Call` statement #73233
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Merged

  • WatchHotReloadService: Reset session id in EndSession #73219
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [17.8] Update source build baseline #73230
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move memory-mapped-text storage system to use the new pattern introduced for memory-mapped-stream storage. #73218
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73231
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73217
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into RefStructInterfaces #73227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Update obsoletion to be an error for a few types #73226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add asset syncing test. #73225
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Non-array params collections are not applicable in expanded form in C# 12 and below. #73223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [WIP] Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix LSP File watching so it correctly reports the baseUri if there's a trailing slash #73203
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for Partitioned Cookies #55370
  • Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55368
  • Feature Request: Integrate ObjectPool into Depdendency Injection #55367
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, updates #55366
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55365
  • Which projects and javascript modules are strictly needed in a source-build only scenario? #55362
  • Clarifying timeouts in SignalR .NET6 #55359
  • Upgrade Polly to v8 in Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly #55356
  • OpenIdConnect .well-known/openid-configuration partially read #55355
  • Perf regression: fortunes #55353

Closed

  • Hybrid Cache API proposal #54647
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #55354
  • Allow customization of Identity Api Routes #55142
  • Add AuthorizationOptions.PreferAllowAnonymous option #55093
  • Support Token Credential Utilities for .http Files #54977
  • Using Multiple authentication scheme I am experiencing recursion #54929
  • How to res the username and pass #54957

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • Quarantine and attempt to fix CacheTagHelper_VaryByCultureComposesWithOtherVaryByOptions test #55369
    area-mvc
  • Cache request values when hosting metrics are enabled #55351
    area-hosting

Merged

  • Fix typos in tooling-consolidation.md #55364
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in repro.md #55357
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • [Infrastructure] Unblock installer #55358
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • Update the severity of CA1826 to suggestion #55361
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • update project templates package reference #55155
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Ensure OutputCaching generates a documentation file #55170
    pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-routing
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Fix form handling and add NuGet pkg docs #55321
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Xml version to address CVE-2023-29331 #55304
    area-infrastructure
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Supports collecting GCSettingsEvent for gc-collect profile #4615
  • [SymbolStore] Add support to index .NET Framework Runtime debugging modules #4616

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Testing] Move repetative code that was created during Appium bump to extention methods #22063
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Memory Leak by default in VisualElementRenderer on iOS #22061
  • [iOS] Flyout button and title disappears after focusing shell search #22060
  • OS system components ignore app theme #22058
  • Provide a way to customize the HttpClient on UriImageSource #22057
  • An issue with Microsoft.Maui.Animations when testing a custom busy indicator control. #22055
  • iOS: button won't expand vertically to fit long text when LineBreakMode="WordWrap" #22054
  • Memory usage increases when scrolling collectionview if resources count is more than 191 #22053
  • [Android] ForegroundScale property in MauiIcon not working in .NET 8 #22052
  • [Android] Maui Blazor Hybrid <video> can't display fullscreen #22049
  • Gradiant on Label and others components #22046
  • [Android] OnSizeAllocated not reported for Android AppShell Flyout content #22045

Closed

  • [BUG] [iOS] CarouselView Alignment problem #20778
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20614
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Android] Tap through grid #21695
  • [Windows] Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged Exception #21990
  • Maui app run with Exception Unhandled "System.StackOverflowException: 'Exception of type 'System.StackOverflowException' was thrown.'" when change maui control to 8.0.40-nightly.10537 #21991
  • DatePicker date format inconsistent #17760
  • Markup Extension not working inside a ControlTemplate #19094
  • Could not compile native assembly file: typemaps.armeabi-v7a.ll #19247
  • Control when splash screen ends #22043
  • .NET MAUI 9.0 preview version increased MacCatalyst minimum version to 15.0(macOS 12.0 Monterey) #22048
  • The key is that you need to cast the PageHandler as IPlatformViewHandler to access the ViewController, as @PureWeen said. To get to the UINavigationItem, you need to look at the ParentViewController at just the right moment in the page's lifecycle. Unfortunately that moment exists somewhere between the page Appearing event and the Loaded event. #22050
  • This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been marked as requiring author feedback to reproduce the issue but has not had any activity for **4 days**. It will be closed if no further activity occurs **within 3 days of this comment**. If it *is* closed, feel free to comment when you are able to provide the additional information and we will re-investigate. #22030
  • [Android] Calling Android.Views.View.Post(Action) on a View that is detached and not then reattached causes the Action and RunnableImplementor to leak. #18757

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Bump $(MicrosoftMauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion) to 8.0.21 #22066
  • Fix main #22065
  • Improve error logging for failed resizetizering #22064
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • Navigate Directly to Test #22019
  • [Windows] Use correct build version check #22013
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • [UI Testing] Split mouse and touch Appium actions and added pending ones (TouchAndHold etc) #21305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area/drawing ✏️, control-border
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Xaml #21927
  • [android] use Java primitive `boolean` for `UriImageSource` #22040
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨, area/keyboard, control-window
  • [iOS] Fix issue that does not allow scrolling in WebView with PDF #21571
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330

  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979

  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908

  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568

  • `Microsoft.Maui-dev.sln` contains an invalid path #22033

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow specifying parameter name in EF.Parameter #33612

Closed

  • Migrations creates extra keys and indexes #33283
  • Issue with retrieving migrations in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools 8.0.1 and above #33606

PullRequests

Updated

  • Remove temporary properties created by ForeignKeyPropertyDiscoveryConvention if they aren't used. #33611

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Enable coherency dependency flow on items just added to the SDK #19592
  • Update .NET 9 p3 to p4 in the table #19587
  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #19585
    Area-SourceBuild

Merged

  • Update artifact size basline #19588
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19586

Updated

  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #19434
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #19583
    Branch Lockdown
